item.title: AI Methods for Permutation Circuit Synthesis Across Generic Topologies
Quantum Processing Unit (QPU) processing time Prediction with Machine Learning
Keynote Speaker at Metafuturo 2025: Quantum Computing + AI Convergence
item.description:
ðŸš€ Thrilled to have been part of Metafuturo 2025 as a keynote speaker!

I had the incredible opportunity to share insights on the convergence of Quantum Computing + AI at this forward-thinking event organized by Bizkaiko Foru Aldundia / DiputaciÃ³n Foral de Bizkaia and ATRESMEDIA.

The intersection of quantum technologies and artificial intelligence represents one of the most exciting frontiers in tech today. During my talk, I shared what we are doing in this field at IBM Quantum. From LLMs and agentic AI applications for quantum computing to AI-optimized quantum circuits, we’re witnessing the birth of computational capabilities that seemed like science fiction just a few years ago.

What struck me most during the event was the genuine curiosity and engagement from attendees across diverse industries. The talks and panels ranged from practical implementations to philosophical implicationsâ€”exactly the kind of multidisciplinary dialogue we need as we navigate this quantum journey.

Huge thanks to the organizers for creating such a vibrant platform for discussing the technologies that will shape our tomorrow. Events like Metafuturo 2025 are essential for building bridges between cutting-edge research and real-world applications.

The future is quantum-enhanced, AI-powered, and closer than we think! ðŸ”¬âš¡

#QuantumComputing #ArtificialIntelligence #Innovation #Metafuturo2025 #TechTrends #QuantumAI #FutureOfTech #IBM

Originally shared on LinkedIn on September 24, 2025 - 107 reactions, 7 comments as of 11/12/2025

item.title: IBM Develops The AI-Quantum Link: Featured in Forbes
item.description:
Excited to share this Forbes article highlighting our work at IBM Quantum on the intersection of AI and quantum computing! ðŸš€

The integration of AI and Quantum Computing has the potential to transform industries and advance quantum computing capabilities significantly. We’re thrilled to be disclosing our results and research papers from this exciting field.

This represents a major step forward in making quantum computing more accessible and powerful through the application of artificial intelligence.

Context: Sharing Forbes article “IBM Develops The AI-Quantum Link” about IBM Quantum’s work integrating AI with quantum computing.

Originally shared on LinkedIn on June 25, 2024 - 98 reactions, 3 comments as of 11/12/2025
